description: Formats errors as though they were Checkstyle output.
descriptionDetails: Imitates the XMLLogger from Checkstyle 4.3. All failures have the 'warning' severity. Files without errors are still included.
sample:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<checkstyle version="4.3">
    <file name="myFile.ts">
        <error line="1" column="14" severity="warning" message="Missing semicolon" source="failure.tslint.semicolon" />
    </file>
</checkstyle>

description: Framed formatter which creates a frame of error code.
descriptionDetails:
Prints syntax highlighted code in a frame with a pointer to where
exactly lint error is happening.

description: Formats errors as though they were JUnit output.
sample:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<testsuites package="tslint">
  <testsuite name="myFile.ts">
    <testcase name="semicolon" classname="myFile.ts">
      <failure type="warning">Missing semicolon Line 1, Column 14</failure>
    </testcase>
  </testsuite>
</testsuites>

description: Formats errors for consumption by msbuild.
descriptionDetails: The output is compatible with both msbuild and Visual Studio.

description: Formats errors as though they were PMD output.
descriptionDetails: Imitates the XML output from PMD. All errors have a priority of 1.
sample:
<pmd version="tslint">
    <file name="myFile.ts">
        <violation begincolumn="14" beginline="1" priority="3" rule="Missing semicolon"></violation>
    </file>
</pmd>

description: The default formatter which outputs simple human-readable messages.
Human-readable formatter which creates stylish messages.
descriptionDetails:
The output matches what is produced by ESLint's stylish formatter.
Its readability is enhanced through spacing and colouring.
Provides error messages output in TAP13 format which can be consumed by any TAP formatter.
sample:
TAP version 13
1..1
not ok 1 - Some error
  ---
  message: Variable has any type
  severity: error
  data:
     ruleName: no-any
     fileName: test-file.ts
     line: 10
     character: 10
     failureString: Some error
     rawLines: Some raw output
  ...

description: The human-readable formatter which includes the rule name in messages.
descriptionDetails: The output is the same as the prose formatter with the rule name included

description: Formats output as VSO/TFS logging commands.
descriptionDetails:
Integrates with Azure DevOps (previously known as Visual Studio Online, Team Foundation Server,
or Visual Studio Team Services) by outputting errors as 'warning' logging commands.
